attributes.comment:
It is sad that our society has found an amazing way to make money off the poor
children, both here and abroad, that only want someone to love them and a safe
place to call home. Adoption is already so expensive that very few can go
through the process with out financial assistance. Adopting parents are
required to jump through so many hoops it is ridiculous. I know our government
agencies are functioning on shrinking budgets but I believe there has to be a
better option than raising these fees. Our CIS fees are already outrageous and
unless it can be better explained I absolutely do not see a reason for
increasing these fees. I ask that you please reconsider these fee changes and
honestly look at options that wouldn't make adoption any more financially
demanding than it already is. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kayla Dutton
